ing: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
des: "My kids absolutely love this simple, fast side dish.  They actually believe if they go in a restaurant, spinach will be served as wonderful as this!"
ins:
Prepare spinach according to package directions; drain well.
In a large saucepan over medium-high heat, combine spinach, mushroom soup and butter.  Bring to a low boil.  Season with garlic salt to taste.
